TEXT.TITLE: CHEROKEE GROUP <CHKE> SHARE OFFERING UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Cherokee Group said an offering of 2,500,000 common shares is underway at 22 dlrs each through underwriters First Boston Inc <FBC> and American Express Co's <AXP> Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc. The company is selling 1,800,000 shares and shareholders 700,000. Reuter
